professionalSummary.pt: Desenvolvedor full-stack com ênfase em desenvolvimento back-end e experiência comprovada em projetos modernos e escaláveis. Possui graduação em Sistemas de Internet pelo IFC e está cursando Sistemas e Tecnologias de Informação na Universidade do Algarve, em Portugal. Planeja realizar um programa de pós-graduação em Segurança Cibernética e um Mestrado em Engenharia de Software, com o objetivo de aprofundar conhecimentos em sistemas de software seguros e de alto desempenho.
professionalSummary.en: Full-stack developer with a strong emphasis on back-end development and proven experience in designing and implementing modern, scalable solutions. Holds a Bachelor's degree in Internet Systems from IFC and is currently pursuing a degree in Systems and Information Technologies Engineering in Portugal. Planning to undertake a postgraduate program in Cybersecurity, followed by a Master's degree in Software Engineering, with the objective of deepening expertise in secure, high-performance software systems.

experience.title: Mid-Level Developer
responsibilities: Full-stack development of SaaS applications using Node.js and React.js
Integrated Meta APIs, asynchronous messaging with Kafka, and OAuth2 authentication
Built an AI-powered WebChat with Redis and PostgreSQL in a multi-tenant, scalable architecture

experience.title: Junior Developer
responsibilities: Developed web pages and interfaces in React.js for SaaS applications
Created chatbots integrated with the official WhatsApp API, implementing conditional logic and automated workflows
Refactored and maintained legacy systems using PHP, Laravel, and Node.js
Collaborated on full-stack projects and integrated relational databases

experience.title: IT Support Analyst
responsibilities: Provided advanced technical support with SSH access for server and service maintenance
Configured and optimized VOIP telephony systems (Asterisk) for clients
Proposed and implemented platform improvements in collaboration with the development team
Developed web pages and integration scripts using PHP, JavaScript, and React.js

experience.title: IT Support Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in troubleshooting technical issues with SSH access
Monitored logs, executed tests, and read backend source code
Participated in API integrations, code review, and PHP development for internal systems
Contributed to WordPress and PHP/JavaScript projects when not handling client support

experience.title: Mobile Developer (Freelancer)
responsibilities: Developed Flutter/Dart apps for e-commerce and service platforms
Integrated card payment gateways (checkout, refunds, subscriptions, webhooks, 3-D Secure, tokenization) and built REST service layers
Implemented secure payment flows, improving reliability, user experience, and approval rates

education.institution: Federal Institute of Santa Catarina – Camboriú
education.description: Degree focused on web, mobile, and intranet systems development, covering software engineering, networking, and databases, enabling work across the full development cycle
Bachelor's degree focusing on information systems, software development, and intelligent technologies, covering mathematics, programming, AI, web, mobile, and networks

certifications.name: Java Developer

certifications.name: React Native Developer
certifications.description: Training in mobile app development with React Native, focusing on UI, APIs, and best practices

certifications.description: ReactJS, NextJS, Styled-Components, testing with Jest, Storybook, Strapi, HTML, and CSS with TypeScript and JavaScript

certifications.name: PHP Programming
